bigMacPriceInfo: Amount divided by the price of a Big Mac
introText1: Curious to know how much WoW has drained your wallet?
introText2: Between your subscription, those flashy mounts, and all the cosmetics, weâ€™ve got the full breakdown for you. Wondering how much you've really spent on the game? We're here to show you!
introText3: Just enter your region, server, and character, and in no time, you'll have the total right in front of you. No need to sign up, no hassle. It's quick, easy, and just a little shocking...
removeAdblock: The details are in stealth mode! Disable your ad blocker to make them appear.
removeAdblockPie: These details are guarded by a magical shield! Disable your ad blocker to break the barrier and reveal them.

share.title: Raid Brag
share.question: Only the true champions of Azeroth dare to reveal their spending. What about you?
share.twitter1: I dared to look at how much I've spent on WoW...

wowchievement.title: Wowchievement
wowchievement.question1: Want to track all your reputation and weekly quests? Visit
wowchievement.question2: to stay on top of everything!

meta.description: Easily calculate and track your spending in World of Warcraft, including subscriptions, microtransactions, and in-game purchases. Discover how much you have actually invested in WoW.
meta.descriptionDashboard: Want to know how much I've spent on WoW? The answer is here!
